uk.ac.ebi.reactionblast.mechanism

Class GlobalEntropyCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ebi.reactionblast.mechanism.GlobalEntropyCalculator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GlobalEntropyCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class maintains the references of a set of RMatrices. The method getGlobalEntropy can be called in order to get the global entropy of a stored RMatrix.
    Author:
    Lorenzo Baldacci {lorenzo@ebi.ac.uk|lbaldacc@csr.unibo.it}
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
